snippet: Prince Amukamara, the 19th overall draft pick, has been a spectator since breaking his left foot two days after signing a four-year contract with the Giants.
lead_paragraph: Prince Amukamara, the 19th overall draft pick, has been a spectator since breaking his left foot two days after signing a four-year contract with the Giants.

headline.main: Waiting Is Painful for Giants’ Top Pick
headline.print_headline: Waiting Is Painful For Giants’ Top Pick
headline.seo: For Giants’ Amukamara, Waiting Is Part of the Game
